title: Litro ups LPG prices
body_lines: State owned Litro has announced a hike in the prices of its LPG cylinders.
From midnight the price of a 5kg cylinder of Litro domestic LP gas has been increased by Rs.874 to Rs.1,945
The  2.3kg cylinder price increased by Rs. 404 to  Rs. 910 and 12.5kg by Rs. 2 185 to Rs. 4,860.
Litro Gas Chairman Vijitha Herath said hike was unavoidable and a loss of Rs. 900 per 12.5 kg cylinder is being incurred despite the latest hike.
He said Litro suffered a loss of Rs. 22 billion in the past year.
